Question: Navigation Instruction given at initial position: [take off and turn back and move forward and go over the buildings and pond and get down at beside the tree and again turn back and fly up. now move forward and go over the trees and road and turn back at top of the brown building and get down at front of the this building. now get down and fly up and turn right and little move forward and turn left and move forward and turn left and move forward and turn back and fly up and beside the blue building and move forward and go over the top of the buildings and turn right and and fly up at front of the brown building. now turn right and again turn right and beside pond and move forward and go over the road and tip of the buildings and turn right and get up and move forward and stay at front of the building.]. At the initial position, you are asked to navigate according to a series of movement instructions. What is the Landmark Position from the pond when you reach your current location?  
choose:  
A. I am on the right side of the pond.  
B. I am located above the pond.  
C. I am located on the left side of the pond.  
D. I am far away from the pond.  
E. I am located below the pond.
